name: EyeTV Schedule File
summary: Learn about .EYETVSCHED files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The EYETVSCHED files, along with .EYETV files and other setup information files, such as the .EYETVP file, are located in the "EyeTV Archive" folder. You can move this folder but it must be named "EyeTV Archive" and you must specify in the application where the folder is located.
The EyeTV is only compatible with OS X and iOS although Geniatech develops peripherals that available for Windows and Android devices. Product availability depends on the country in which you reside.
NOTE: Geniatech acquired EyeTV from Elgato in February 2016.

description: Schedule created and used by EyeTV, a program that allows users to watch and record live TV on their computers; contains a schedule that tells the application what and when to record; deleted after the recording is complete unless the schedule is set to repeat.
